plot: The first ever Mr. Gay China Pageant. The event was canceled by the police just hours before the start, causing a huge media storm both in - and outside of China.
title: Comrades, You've Worked Hard!
plot_es: The first ever Mr. Gay China Pageant. The event was canceled by the police just hours before the start, causing a huge media storm both in - and outside of China.
plot_en: The first ever Mr. Gay China Pageant. The event was canceled by the police just hours before the start, causing a huge media storm both in - and outside of China.
